languages.text: {n}Идира всхлипывает от ваших слов.{/n} "Я... спасибо вам, Лорд-капитан. Ума не приложу, откуда у вас столько доброты ко мне, раз вместе дошли, через все, что было... Я ведь только из-за вас и жива до сих пор! Сгинуть возможностей было — не перечесть..."

{n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира всхлипывает от ваших слов.{/n} "Я... спасибо вам, Лорд-капитан. Ума не приложу, откуда у вас столько доброты ко мне, раз вместе дошли, через все, что было... Я ведь только из-за вас и жива до сих пор! Сгинуть возможностей было — не перечесть..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I cannot imagine why you have shown so much kindness for me, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I am still alive! There were so many ways for me to die..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I cannot imagine why you have shown so much kindness for me, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I am still alive! There were so many ways for me to die..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，伊迪拉抽泣起来。{/n}“我……谢谢你，舰长大人。我真不敢想象，我们遭遇了那么多事情之后，你居然还对我这么好……我之所以还活着，完全是因为有你！否则，我恐怕早就变着花样死上几百遍了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，伊迪拉抽泣起来。{/n}“我……谢谢你，舰长大人。我真不敢想象，我们遭遇了那么多事情之后，你居然还对我这么好……我之所以还活着，完全是因为有你！否则，我恐怕早就变着花样死上几百遍了……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira solloza al oír tus palabras.{/n} «Yo... gracias, Lord Capitán. No soy capaz de imaginar por qué me ha mostrado tanta amabilidad, después de todo lo que hemos pasado... ¡Usted es el único motivo por el que he sobrevivido hasta ahora! Podría haber muerto en tantas ocasiones...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira solloza al oír tus palabras.{/n} «Yo... gracias, Lord Capitán. No soy capaz de imaginar por qué me ha mostrado tanta amabilidad, después de todo lo que hemos pasado... ¡Usted es el único motivo por el que he sobrevivido hasta ahora! Podría haber muerto en tantas ocasiones...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉にイディラは涙を流す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、本当に…ありがとう。こんなにも親切にしてもらえるなんて嘘みたい。いろいろなことがあったのに…あたいがまだ生きているのは、あなたのおかげに他ならないわ！あなたがいなかったら、何度も死んでいたかも…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉にイディラは涙を流す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、本当に…ありがとう。こんなにも親切にしてもらえるなんて嘘みたい。いろいろなことがあったのに…あたいがまだ生きているのは、あなたのおかげに他ならないわ！あなたがいなかったら、何度も死んでいたかも…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schluchzt angesichts deiner Worte.{/n} "Ich ... danke Euch, Lord Captain. Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr mir solche Güte zeigt, nach allem, was wir durchgemacht haben ... Ihr seid der einzige Grund, warum ich noch am Leben bin! Ich hätte auf so viele Arten sterben können ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schluchzt angesichts deiner Worte.{/n} "Ich ... danke Euch, Lord Captain. Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr mir solche Güte zeigt, nach allem, was wir durchgemacht haben ... Ihr seid der einzige Grund, warum ich noch am Leben bin! Ich hätte auf so viele Arten sterben können ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles arrachent un sanglot ému à Idira.{/n} « Je... Merci à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Après tout ce qu'on a traversé, je ne comprends toujours pas pourquoi vous avez fait preuve d'une telle générosité envers moi... Si je suis encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce à vous ! J'aurais pu mourir mille fois... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles arrachent un sanglot ému à Idira.{/n} « Je... Merci à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Après tout ce qu'on a traversé, je ne comprends toujours pas pourquoi vous avez fait preuve d'une telle générosité envers moi... Si je suis encore en vie, c'est uniquement grâce à vous ! J'aurais pu mourir mille fois... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin karşısında İdira'nın gözleri doluyor.{/n} "Ben... Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Yaşadığımız bunca şeyden sonra bana neden bu kadar iyi davrandığını hâlâ anlamıyorum... Hayatta kalmamın tek sebebi sensin! Sayısız şekilde ölmüş olabilirdim..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira sobs at your words.{/n} "I... thank you, Lord Captain. I can't imagine why you've shown me so much kindness, after everything we have been through... You are the only reason I'm still alive! There were so many ways I could've died..."
